}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This adapter is apparently sold with the [[Buffalo WZR-D1100H]] in a bundle pack ([http://www.amazon.co.jp/BUFFALO-AOSS2-11ac%E6%8A%80%E8%A1%93-%E7%84%A1%E7%B7%9ALAN%E8%A6%AA%E6%A9%9F-WZR-D1100H/dp/B00AA6TGQ8/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1376035585&sr=8-1&keywords=WI-U2-400D WZR-D1100H/U on '''Amazon.co.jp''']. :The device is presumed to use BCM43526. It is likely identical to the [[Buffalo WI-U2-866D]] (minus strictly regulatory differences)..
[[Category:English Documentation]]
